response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and utility, I am confident it aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a purchase price of $750,000. This offer represents an opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 750000}
